name: Babymouse: Our Hero - Spot the Difference Game FREE
name_original: Babymouse: Our Hero - Spot the Difference Game FREE
description:
Play the FREE Babymouse: Our Hero Spot the Difference image puzzle game based on the popular Babymouse kids comic book series. See if you have what it takes to spot the difference between the two comic book images! The game has tons of levels featuring three different modes for all ages and skill levels: beginner, expert and genius.

Kids love Babymouse star of the popular, award-winning, hilarious, pink graphic novel series showcasing the trials and tribulations of elementary school. The sassy mouse with attitude to spare has charmed her way into the hearts of kids, parents, and teachers everywhere! Now you can play the FREE game based on Babymouse!

NY Times bestselling and Newbery Honor winning author Jennifer Holm partners up with her brother Matthew Holm in this graphic novel series that has won multiple Children's Choices awards, and one title was the first graphic novel ever to be named an ALA Notable Children's Book.

• A fun and enjoyable way for kids to fall in love with reading literature
• Great for developing visual and spatial problem solving skills in kids
• Three different modes for all ages and skill levels: beginner, expert and genius
• Winner 2006 - Gryphon Award
• Winner 2006 - ALA Notable Children's Book
• Winner 2006 - New York Book Show Awards
